title: RPC error
body:
#### System information

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
CentOS 8.5

#### Expected behaviour
Rpc working fine on BSC chain

#### Actual behaviour
giving an error using getTransactionReceipt.
`goroutine 51972 [runnable]:
github.com/torquem-ch/mdbx-go/mdbx._Cfunc_mdbxgo_cursor_get1(0x76b6c40537c0, 0xc0f73eea60, 0x20, 0xc0f7396320, 0xc0f7396330, 0xf)

	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib@v0.0.0-20220224151801-2fc62cd2f54e/kv/mdbx/kv_mdbx.go:1385 +0x265
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-lib/kv/mdbx.(*MdbxTx).GetOne(0xc0f9e99190, {0x15dbb9a, 0x152a8e0}, {0xc0f73eea60, 0x20, 0x20})

	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/rpc/handler.go:181 +0x111

	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/rpc/handler.go:271 +0xc5
created by github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/rpc.(*handler).startCallProc
	github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/rpc/handler.go:267 +0x92
`

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Starting a for loop using getTransactionReceipt

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

If using a snapshot, I updated to the current version of erigon and now get this error:

`Could not connect to DB                  err="create bucket: LastForkchoice, mdbx_dbi_open: MDBX_NOTFOUND: No matching key/data pair found"`

1. What kind of snapshot? Did you stop erigon when created snapshot?
2. Are you sure that you using correct directory? Show folders structure and erigonâ€™s cli flags
